explains: n. 使人分心的事物，干扰；分心的事物，干扰；消遣，娱乐；心烦意乱

sentences.en: The children are driving me to distraction today.
sentences.cn: 今天孩子们闹得我心烦意乱。

sentences.en: A very clingy child can drive a parent to distraction.
sentences.cn: 依赖性很强的孩子会让父母发疯。

sentences.en: Driven to distraction, he murdered the woman who jilted him.
sentences.cn: 盛怒之下，他谋杀了抛弃他的那个女人。
